Crime and abuse

The main goal of the Ministry of Justice and the Police is to ensure that fundamental guarantees of due process protection are maintained and developed. It is an overriding goal to ensure the security of society and the individual.
On this page you will find general information and documents relating to crime and abuse. You can explore this topic in more detail by using the menu on the right.

The Norwegian Government’s Action Plan for combating economic crime
[Plan, Ministry of Justice and Public Security, 09.06.2004]

The Government is giving priority to increased efforts against economic crime. An action plan for combating economic crime with measures aimed at several areas of society, will be implemented over the course of 2004-2007.
